Create a new coordinate system with the following parameters: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] 2. Draw the 2D sketch for the base on the XY plane. 3. Create a loop with six lines: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.75, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.285] * Line 3: Start Point [0.75, 0.285], End Point [0.375, 0.285] * Line 4: Start Point [0.375, 0.285], End Point [0.375, 0.1875] * Line 5: Start Point [0.375, 0.1875], End Point [0.0, 0.1875] * Line 6: Start Point [0.0, 0.1875], End Point [0.0, 0.0] **Part 2: Constructing a smaller rectangular prism on top of part 1** 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following parameters: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.375, 0.225, 0.285] 2. Draw the 2D sketch for the base on the XY plane. 3. Create a loop with four lines: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.375, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.375, 0.0], End Point [0.375, 0.3] * Line 3: Start Point [0.375, 0.3], End Point [0.0, 0.3] * Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.3], End Point [0.0, 0.0] 4. Extrude the 2D sketch by 0.09 units in the negative Z-direction. Summary: The final shape is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. It consists of two intermediate parts: a larger rectangular prism (Part 1) and a smaller rectangular prism (Part 2) stacked on top of the larger one. Part 1 has the following dimensions: length - 0.75 units, width - 0.525 units, height - 0.75 units. Part 2 has the following dimensions: length - 0.375 units, width - 0.375 units, height - 0.09 units.</description>

Extrude the 2D sketch along the X-axis in the negative direction (towards the left) by a distance of 0.375. This will create a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side.
